document.masterDocTitle: New species and additional records of Ischnosoma from Georgia (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Tachyporinae)

C o m m e n t:
Ischnosoma myops
is the most widespread and common Caucasian representative of the
I. spelaeum
group, its confirmed distribution ranging from Northeast Anatolia ( Rize , Artvin ) to Central Georgia , with the easternmost confirmed record at 43°43' eastern longitude ( Map 2 ). The habitus, forebody (lateral view), and the male sexual characters are illustrated in Figs 7-8 , 38-39, 46 .
